text.sentence: Linda and I had a good visit Sunday for about six hours.
We had a nice lunch at an outdoor cafe, went shopping in the Village, and then went back to my house for a chat.
She is a beautiful 14 year old, blond like Linda but with Tim's dark eyes and full eyebrows.

She was voted the #1 girl in an underground survey done by the boys in her class, and Linda was a little concerned about that because Jenny is a little developed for her age group and she's afraid the boys interest is a little prurient.
Her marriage is going well despite Steve's current unemployed status.
But she is doing well in her job, they moved into a bigger house and Tim bought her old one, and all in all is at a very good place in her life.
I'm getting ready to leave for New Orleans tomorrow for our Legal Conference.
We have dinner reservations at Emeril's for 9:00 tomorrow night and we're all a bit excited about that.
Then Thursday night is our big night out at a blues club.
This email was a good idea.
Linda got my address and I hope to be chatting with her more than every two years!
I'll be in touch when I get back.
